description:
Colombia’s peace commissioner and rearmed guerrilla chief “Ivan Marquez” announced new peace talks. In a press statement, Peace Commissioner Otty Patiño and Marquez’s group, Segunda Marquetalia, said that the peace…

The post Colombia announces peace talks with rearmed former FARC chief appeared first on Colombia News | Colombia Reports.
title: Colombia announces peace talks with rearmed former FARC chief
